entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
